description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr3512 [Bandai Namco Games]` raising simulation and rhythm game by the same name, in which players assume the role of producers and lead http://anidb.net/t2438 [idols] under their care to fame and stardom.
THE IDOLM@STER follows 13 girls from the 765 Production Studio, whose sole goal is to become the top idols in the Japanese entertainment industry. Along with the laughs, struggles and tears that are inherently part of this journey, you will cheer for the girls of IDOLM@STER as they climb their way to the top!
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
In Tokyo, there is 765 Productions; they have 12 rookie idols and producers who are working toward their dreams.  One morning a cameraman was tasked to captured a day in the life at 765 Productions, what he saw will surprise you and the idols.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore kara ga Kanojo-tachi no Hajimari
これからが彼女たちのはじまり

REGULAR.description:
The girls’ promo photos aren’t that great, and the idea to re-take them in a more natural way has been proposed.  While the girls try to establish their individuality, Iorin, Ami, Mami, and Yayoi develop a plan to outshine them all.
Source: crunchyroll

The 765 idols land themselves a mini-concert at a summer event! All of them are excited because it`ll be the first time in a while they all get to perform together and they even get to sing. They all head towards the village where they`re going to perform with high hopes, but when they arrive, they find themselves deep in the mountains, in a village with an extremely rural feel. The youth organization that comes to greet them, filled with men, only further amplifies Yukiho`s stage fright...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everything Starts with One Courageous Step
Subete wa Ippo no Yuuki kara
すべては一歩の勇気から

REGULAR.description:
Four of the girls are going to appear on the cable TV show Ribbit Ribbit Kitchen.  Each of the idols show off their specialties as the producer watches, but Chihaya has trouble with the comedy-like style of the program.  And then when she learns that the program` format has changed so she won`t be singing, she gets even more unhappy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jibun o Kaeru to Iu Koto
自分を変えるということ

REGULAR.description:
The air conditioning is broken in 765 Pro`s office and it`s like a sauna. To escape the heat, they decide to take a company trip to the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みんなとすごす夏休み

REGULAR.description:
Ritsuko`s new idol group`s hot debut, Ryuuguu Komachi. The group`s members, Iori, Ami, Azusa are so busy with meet & greets, television appearances, and releasing their new debut song, they don`t have time to do anything else. But the other idols, in comparison, have nothing to do at all. The producer starts to panic seeing what`s going on, and promises to get the girls a bunch of work, but all of that enthusiasm doesn`t exactly pay off...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saki ni Susumu to Iu Sentaku

REGULAR.description:
Through an unexpected turn of events, Iori and Hibiki end up eating dinner at Yayoi`s house. Yayoi`s the eldest daughter in her large family, so she helps out making food and taking care of her younger brothers and sisters because her parents get home late. Today they`re having their Bean Sprout Day that they have every week, so the two of them stop to get a lot of bean spouts during a sale at the supermarket and head towards Yayoi`s house. Yayoi`s happy family greet them, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daisuki na Mono, Taisetsu na Mono
Things You Love, Things That Are Important
大好きなもの, 大切なもの

REGULAR.description:
Azusa, Miki and Makoto take up a modeling job in a church for a wedding magazine. The three of them are dressed up and Azusa is pleased with her wedding dress. But men in black show up during the shoot and take Azusa away. They were looking for a bride and got the wrong person, and even though the issue is solved right away, Azusa is left behind, lost, and can`t find her way...
Source: crunchyroll

It`s afternoon when Ryuuguu Komachi completed the shooting for a detective drama when something happens that shakes the very core of 765 Production. Iori bought some extremely rare pudding as a present for herself and the other members of the office, and now it`s gone missing! Ami and Mami are now on the case searching for the person who ate their pudding. They embark on their quest, but you`ll never guess who did it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Things You Can Do As Two
ふたりだから出来ること

REGULAR.description:
765 Production is participating in the Talent Agency Track Meet, held once a year, because of Ryuuguu Komachi`s success. They all work together to take first in the idol category, but they find themselves vying for the position with Shinkan Shoujo, an extremely popular idol group. Then, one of Shinkan Shoujo`s members says something harsh to Yayoi, causing her to become depressed...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minna de, Sukoshi de mo Mae e
Moving Forward a Little Bit, With Everyone
みんなで, 少しでも前へ

REGULAR.description:
765 Production finally gets their own concert! It`ll mainly feature Ryuuguu Komachi, but the rest of the idols will also make an apperance. Everyone`s ecstatic. So they all get started practicing dancing and singing for the event. But each idol has their own talents. Everyone wants to do their best for the concert and not simplify things so that all members can participate, but certain members start getting warn out...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 期待, 不安, そして予兆

REGULAR.description:
Miki realizes the conversation she had with the producer when he told her that she could get into Ryuuguu Komachi if she tries hard is a misunderstanding. Miki has a loss of momentum and willpower and stops showing up to practice for their concert and doesn`t even come in to check her outfit for the event. The producer struggles to find Miki, realizing just how much he hurt Miki with his careless remark, but she...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Last Stop on a One Way Ride

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for 765 Production`s concert!  The idols are excited and nervous about their first big concert.  But the members of Ryuuguu Komachi were at a small concert in the countryside and got caught in a typhoon.  The bullet trains have stopped running, and they`re not sure they can make it back.  Everybody starts to get really worried.  Will their concert be a success?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And So, the Girls Head to the Sparkling Stage
Soshite, Kanojo-tachi wa Kirameku Stage e
そして, 彼女たちはきらめくステージへ

REGULAR.description:
Ever since the concert and raving article, the Idols have become popular to the point they have to wear disguises.  While waiting for see the cover of a magazine staring all the Idols, they are shocked to learn their rivals Jupiter are on it.  What has happened?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The World Has Begun to Change!

REGULAR.description:
The 765 idols appear in a live show "Live?! On Sundays." Haruka, Miki and Chihaya anchor the program. Hibiki has a segement where she attempts some sort of challenge every week. Yukiho has a "Let`s Change Kikuchi Makoto" segement, and Ami and Mami have short skits that they do--there`s a bunch going on in this show. The idols show their stuff while crazy things happen because it`s all live!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Together, it`s a Live Broadcast! A Live Broadcast!
Minna Sorotte, Namahousou Desu yo Namahousou!
みんな揃って, 生放送ですよ生放送!

REGULAR.description:
Hibiki and Inumi are fighting leading to only one showing up for today’s shoot.  In the meantime 961 productions have come up with a new scheme to destroy a 765 Idol.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ひとりぼっちの気持ち

REGULAR.description:
Makoto is considered a prince among her female fans, but she wants to be a princess.  A chance date with Producer might make those feelings come true. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 真, まことの王子様

REGULAR.description:
Ritsuko is pushing Ryuuguu Komachi hard for their upcoming secret concert.  Unfortunately Azusa is sick and can’t perform.  Who can fill in on such short notice… Ritsuko?! 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: たくさんの, いっぱい

REGULAR.description:
A paparazzi hired by 961 Production is following Takane Shijou.  She is photographed spending time with owner of Elder Records.  Is she ready to leave 765 Production?  What?! Chihaya has lost her voice?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kumoma ni Kakureru Tsuki no Gotoku
Like the Moon, Hidden Among Clouds
雲間に隠れる月の如く

REGULAR.description:
An article appears in a gossip magazine about Chihaya`s past. It was about Chihaya`s late-younger brother and her now-divorced parents. Due to the shock from the article, laced with malice, Cihhaya loses her voice. As she has lost her voice, she does not want to continue to be an idol and stops going to the office. Haruka, worried, visits Chihaya in her apartment where she lives alone...
Source: crunchyroll

Chihaya is able to stand in front of a crowd once again after receiving help from her friends and Haruka. She gives an interview about what really happened in her past so she can get back to work. 765 is now stronger than ever, but Kuroi of 961 Production isn`t pleased about that fact and plans to set his final trap in a concert the girls and Jupiter will appear in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maru de Hana ga Saku You ni
まるで花が咲くように

REGULAR.description:
The idols of 765 Production have been working nonstop thanks to their Producer.  But because of all that work they haven’t been able to spend time as a group.  So Haruka and Producer try to do the impossible and have a staff Christmas party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On the Night of the Holy Night

REGULAR.description:
The idols are practicing for their New Year’s concert but the schedule makes it nearly impossible.  And the bad news won’t stop, Live, On Sundays! Is being cancelled!  Can it get worst…?
Source: crunchyroll

With the producer in the hospital things have changed around 765 Production.  The once cheerful Hark has lost faith in being an Idol, and her sadness casts a shadow among the girls.  Who will bring back the light?
Source: crunchyroll

The day of the New Year’s concert finally comes. The producer is still recovering and when Kotori goes to check in on him, he asks a favor of her. Meanwhile, the idols are excited that this will be the largest concert they`ve ever done, and each of them have now found what it means to be an idol to them. 765 Production finally stand on stage together for this large production.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みんなと, いっしょに!
